hero.p: Space created to share open source projects, taking knowledge to another level.

cards.title: Audio Seven
cards.description: Audio player created in Html, Css and JavaScript, simple and elegant.

cards.title: Chendo Calc
cards.description: Scientific calculator, built with Html, Css and JavaScript, intermediate use.

cards.title: Windows
cards.description: This version of windows is created in React, but also has a PHP version.

cards.title: Space
cards.description: This is a project based on a challenge from FrontenMentor, it has Html, Css and JavaScript.

cards.title: Devaechba
cards.description: This project was created with Html, Css and JavaScript, site under construction.

cards.title: Ace Search
cards.description: Image search engine that uses the Pexels API, created in Html, Css and JavaScript.

cards.title: dotenv.core
cards.description: dotenv.core is a class library for read and parsing .env files in .NET Core

cards.title: seztion-parser.net
cards.description: seztion-parser is a class library used to read data from each section of a file (the file extension can be any, e.g. .INI).

cards.title: Capture The Flag SA-MP
cards.description: Capture The Flag is a gamemode for SA-MP created with .NET/C# and SampSharp.net

cards.title: DentallApp BackEnd
cards.description: A web service for dental software that allows to schedule appointments and send automatic appointment reminders to patients.
